passive.description: After not taking damage for 10s, gains a Shield equal to 15% of the target's Max HP. When hit by Basic Attack Damage, applies [Frost] to the attacker. [Frost]: Reduces Attack Speed and Movement Speed by 30% for 4s.

basicAttacks.description: [Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage.Can cast [Ice Burst] every 5s. Deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage to the target and Immobilizes them for 1.5s

Replaces Basic Attack with [Frostbite Zone]Creates a zone of deep frost in the target direction,dealing [Damage Rate: 130%] Magic Damage to enemiesin range and reducing their Movement Speed by 25% for4s

Replaces Basic Attack with [Frost Burst].Launches three frost shards in the target direction after adelay, each dealing [Damage Rate: 110%] Magic Damageto enemies hit. The damage from shards beyond the firstis reduced by 25%.

commonSkills.description: Channels for 3s, continuously firing a frost beam in thetarget direction that deals [Damage Rate: 60%] MagicDamage to players ([Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damageto mobs) every 0.5s to those hit and inflicts [Frost BeamSlow] for 3s, stacking up to 5 times. [Frost Beam Slow]Movement Speed Bonus: -8% (-8% per stack, can stack)
Launches crystalline frost in the target direction. Uponhitting the first enemy, it explodes to deal [Damage Rate: 250%] Magic Damage and Immobilize enemies in rangefor 2s.
Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to nearbyenemies and Freezes them for 0.5s, then blinks in thetarget direction.

Creates a frost wall before the caster that lasts 8s.Enemies inside are Slowed by 70%, take [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage every second, and gain [Chill] stacks.Stacks up to 2 times.[Chill]: At max stacks, targets are Frozen for 1.5s andbecome immune to [Chill] for 6s.

Unleashes a Frost Roar in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage to enemies in range, knocking them back 14m, and reducing their Movement Speed by 30% and Attack Speed by 30% for 4s.

skills.description: Channels for 3s, releasing frost winds in the targetdirection that deal [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damageto players ([Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to mobs)every 0.5s and reduce Movement Speed by 30% for 3s.Can move slowly while channeling
Creates a freezing cyclone at the target location, lasting5s. Enemies inside are Slowed by 60% and take  [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage every second.

Launches an ice projectile at the target, dealing [Damage Rate: 160%] Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and applying 30% Slow and [Chilling], for 4 seconds. Then bounces randomly up to 9 times among nearby targets. If no other enemies are present around the target, it bounces back to the caster. When bouncing back to itself, gains a Shield Value equal to 10% of the target's Max HP for 4 seconds. While this shield is active, taking Basic Attack Damage applies [Frost] to the attacker.[Frost]: Reduces Attack Speed and Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds.[Chilling]: Upon stacking to 3 layers, immediately enters Frozen state for 1.5 seconds

Places a Frost Nova at the target location, lasting 15s.When triggered by an enemy, deals [Damage Rate: 250%]Magic Damage and reduces Movement Speed by 35% and15% reduced healing for 6s.Gains 1 charge every 15s, up to 3 charges

Launches a freezing orb in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage every 1 second to enemies in range and slowing them by 30% for 3 seconds. Within 3 seconds, you can click the skill again to blink to the current orb's location, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies, freezing them for 1.5 seconds, and granting allies within range a Shield equal to 15% of the target's max HP. When hit by Basic Attack Damage, applies [Frost] to the attacker.[Frost]: Reduces Attack Speed and Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds.The blink can cross terrain; if the destination is unreachable, it will teleport to the nearest walkable area near the target point.

Removes all Control Effects and generates 6 surrounding Ice Fracture Fragments around the user for 10 seconds. While active, increases Casting Speed by 40% and Damage Resistance by 25%. When other Weapon Skills deal damage, launches 1 Ice Fracture Fragment toward the target, dealing [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage and applying 10% Reduced Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times

Creates a frost crystal at the target location that formsafter 0.7s, dealing [Damage Rate: 75%] Magic Damageand Freezing enemies for 1.5s.After 1s, the crystal shatters, dealing [Damage Rate: 400%] Magic Damage, and reducing Movement Speed by40% and Attack Speed by 40% for 6s

Launches an ice blade forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to enemies in its path, applying 1 stack of [Hypothermia] and reducing their Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. When [Hypothermia] reaches 6 stacks, the target gains [Deep Frost]. After launching two ice blades, the third ice blade's damage increases to [Damage Rate: 145%] Magic Damage. [Deep Frost]: Cannot perform Basic Attacks or Move. Lasts 1.5 seconds.
